title: Scholarship Opportunity
content: We're excited to announce a special scholarship opportunity for our community! Every Thursday from 11:30 PM to 12:30 PM, we will be hosting a weekly contest. The top five winners from each contest will earn the chance to join the U-CAN Academy E-Learning Platform for free. This is your chance to enhance your learning experience and gain access to a wealth of resources, all while showcasing your knowledge and skills. Mark your calendars and get ready to participate! Good luck!
steps: Visit the Home Page: Navigate to the main page of our website.
Click on the Weekly Contest Card: Locate the card labeled 'Weekly Contest' on the home page. It should be prominently displayed with details about the contest.
Follow the Instructions: Once you click the card, you will be directed to the contest page with all the necessary instructions to participate.
